entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 29 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Runoff has begun, with significant rises on area streams... Warmer temperatures last week increased mountain snowmelt, resulting in significant rises on area streams. The addition of significant precipitation through Tuesday will add more runoff to these waterways.
